text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

Fuyuko-chan,
During rehearsal, your final position was wrong.
You did that on purpose, didn't you?

...
Don't say things that sound bad.

The cameraman was aiming the camera this way, right?
If we had stayed like that, you would've been hidden.

The audience wants to see you the most,
So it's only natural to adjust accordingly.

Huh?
Who told you that?

...
You should know even without being told.
I don't understand,
Don't lump me in with you.

Asahi-chan,
What's up? Feeling good?

?
Yeah, I'm good?

...Oh, speaking of which, the unit live preparations
Are being left entirely to us, right?

Haha, don't worry about it~
It's only natural for us to handle it when we have free time!

But, you know, we also need to work harder, If we keep
going like this, we won't be able to work with Asahi-chan.

I heard from the producer,
That we're practicing MC.

Well, you know, we're still far from perfect.
Compared to Asahi-chan, it's like night and day!

When you see us on TV or something, it's hard to believe
we're in the same unit. It feels like we're real top idols!
Is that so, huh...

(I still don't feel like I can catch up to Asahi-chan,
But I need to improve a bit, right?)
